abilities.name: Battle Armour
abilities.effect: Critical Hits

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.effect: Fire

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.effect: The following moves have no effect on the Pokemon: Acid Spray, Aura Sphere, Barrage, Beak Blast, Bullet Seed, Egg Bomb, Electro Ball, Energy Ball, Focus Blast, Gyro Ball, Ice Ball, Magnet Bomb, Mist Ball, Mud Bomb, Octazooka, Pollen Puff, Rock Wrecker, Searing Shot, Seed Bomb, Shadow Ball, Sludge Bomb, Weather Ball, and Zap Cannon.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.effect: While in Sunny Weather, the Speed stat of the Pokemon is doubled.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.effect: Effects that lower or raise the the user's Combat Stages have the opposite effect.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.effect: When an opposite gendered foe attacks the user, they become Infatuated after damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.effect: A pokemon may not use the Moves Explosion or Self-Destruct, nor activate the Ability Aftermath, within 20 meters of the user.

abilities.name: Dark Art
abilities.effect: Dark

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.effect: Whenever the user has a Combat Stage lowered by an external force, its Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages for each stage the other was lowered.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.effect: The user loses 1/8th of its maximum HP at the beginning of each round while in Sunny Weather, and heals the same amount in Rainy Weather. Fire type Moves deal damage as if the attacker were 1 Combat Stage higher in the relevant stat, and Water type Moves heal the user for the amount of damage they would cause if the user was Resistant to them.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.effect: When making Sleep Checks, the counter starts at 11.

abilities.name: Fae Force
abilities.effect: Fairy

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.effect: When a foe hits the user with a Melee move, they become Burned after damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.effect: The user does not take damage from Fire moves and may not be Frozen. If hit by a Fire move, the user adds +1/2 STAB to the next Fire Type move they use in the current encounter.

abilities.name: Flower Gift
abilities.effect: In Sunny Weather, Flower Gift creates a 4-meter burst. The user and all of their allies in Sunny Weather have their Attack and Special Defense raised by 2 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Focus
abilities.effect: Fighting

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.effect: The adjacent target reveals what item they are holding, if any.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.effect: When given a consumable item, the Pokemon immediately eats it. Any effects of the item are doubled.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.effect: Ghost

abilities.name: Heatproof
abilities.effect: The user halves the damage they would take from Fire type Moves after applying weakness and resistance.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.effect: While in Rainy Weather, the user is healed of Burn, Freezing, Paralysis, Poison, or Sleep effects.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.effect: The user's Attack is raised by 1 Combat Stage, but the user's Accuracy Check requirements for Physical Moves are raised by 2.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.effect: The user ignores Coats, Hazards, and Walls.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.effect: Flinching

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.effect: Lower one target's Attack 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.effect: The user deals an additional 2 STAB damage when using Punch Moves, as well as Hammer-Arm, Meteor Mash, and Sky Uppercut.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.effect: The user cannot have its Accuracy Check negatively effected by anything other than the target's Evasion.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.effect: The user may drop helf items at will as a free action, even if they have status afflictions. The user may also hold an item and ignore any effects the item has.

abilities.name: Landslide
abilities.effect: Ground

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.effect: While in Sunny Weather, the user is healed of Burn, Freezing, Paralysis, Poison, or Sleep effects.

abilities.name: Liquid Voice
abilities.effect: When using a Move with the Sound keyword, the Move is changed into a Water type.

abilities.name: Long Reach
abilities.effect: The user makes no contact with targets when using moves. Also, melee ranged moves are treated as Ranged (10) instead.

abilities.name: Mach Speed
abilities.effect: Flying

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.effect: When the user hits an opponent that is holding an item with a ranged move, and is not holding an item, the user takes the target's held item.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.effect: When Asleep, Burned, Frozen, Paralyzed, or Poisoned, the user's Defense and Special Defense are raised by 2 Combat Stages. They return to their previous values when cured of their status affliction.

abilities.name: Mind Mold
abilities.effect: Psychic

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.effect: Whenever the user's Moves cause a target to faint, the user may raise its Attack by 1 Combat Stage.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.effect: The Infatuation conditon, and the effects of the Move Taunt.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.effect: Grass

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, any none-damaging Moves the user knows can be used as an Interrupt, unless it sets the target's HP to 0.

abilities.name: Protean
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, whenever the user uses a Move, it immediately changes its Type to match the Move it's using, before dealing damge.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.effect: When in Rainy Weather, the user regains 1/16th of their maximum HP at the beginning of their turns.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.effect: The user deals an additional 2 STAB damage when using Moves that cause recoil damage.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.effect: When battling a same-gendered foe, the user may raise their Attack by 2 Combat Stages - once per Encounter only.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.effect: Recoil

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.effect: The user does not take damage from Grass moves. If hit by one, the user may raise its Attack 1 Combat Stage once per turn.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.effect: Once used, Sheer Force is active until the end of the encounter. Moves that have additional effects that activate during an Accuracy Check ignore the additional effects, and instead deal an additional 2 STAB damage.

abilities.name: Shell Armour
abilities.effect: Critical Hits

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.effect: Add an additional Damage Dice Roll - including the base damage - when the user gets a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.effect: While in Sunny Weather, the user loses 1/8ths of its max hp on its turn, and its Special Attack is raised by 2 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.effect: For the remainder of the encounter, the user's Speed is raised by 1 Combat Stage at the start of its turn.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: While in Rainy Weather, the user's Speed is raised by 4 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: The user is resistant to Fire and Ice type Moves.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.effect: Water

abilities.name: Unbreakable
abilities.effect: Steel

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.effect: After consuming a held item, the user's Speed is raised by 2 Combat Stages.

abilities.name: Venom
abilities.effect: Poison
